item.title: My first post. The first of many.
item.description: Why another blog? The last few years I’ve been entertaining the idea of having a blog. A sort of personal writing canvas to draft some thoughts and throw them into, without any pretentious goals. In the best case, to help other people and exchange ideas, and at the very least to help myself - by having a log that I can look back and assess how my views evolved over time.
